bands.en: Fully addresses all parts of the task. Presents a fully developed position in answer to the question with relevant, fully extended and well supported ideas.
bands.zh: 完全回应所有任务要求，观点发展充分，论证有力。

bands.en: Covers all parts of the task. Presents a well-developed response to the question with relevant, extended and supported ideas.
bands.zh: 覆盖所有任务点，回应完整，支持充分。

bands.en: Addresses all parts of the task. Presents a clear position throughout the response. Presents, extends and supports main ideas, but there may be a tendency to overgeneralise and/or supporting ideas may lack focus.
bands.zh: 回应完整，立场清晰，观点支持较好，可能略泛化或不够集中。
